verses.verse: A Psalm of David <S%H1732><s%>, when he changed <S%H8138><s%> his behaviour <S%H2940><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%>; who drove him away <S%H1644><s%>, and he departed <S%H3212><s%>. I will bless <S%H1288><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> at all times <S%H6256><s%>: his praise <S%H8416><s%> shall continually <S%H8548><s%> be in my mouth <S%H6310><s%>.
My soul <S%H5315><s%> shall make her boast <S%H1984><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: the humble <S%H6035><s%> shall hear <S%H8085><s%> thereof, and be glad <S%H8055><s%>.
O magnify <S%H1431><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> with me, and let us exalt <S%H7311><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>.
I sought <S%H1875><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and he heard <S%H6030><s%> me, and delivered <S%H5337><s%> me from all my fears <S%H4035><s%>.
They looked <S%H5027><s%> unto him, and were lightened <S%H5102><s%>: and their faces <S%H6440><s%> were not ashamed <S%H2659><s%>.
This poor man <S%H6041><s%> cried <S%H7121><s%>, and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> him, and saved <S%H3467><s%> him out of all his troubles <S%H6869><s%>.
The angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> encampeth <S%H2583><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him, and delivereth <S%H2502><s%> them.
O taste <S%H2938><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%>: blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H1397><s%> that trusteth <S%H2620><s%> in him.
O fear <S%H3372><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, ye his saints <S%H6918><s%>: for there is no want <S%H4270><s%> to them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him.

The young lions <S%H3715><s%> do lack <S%H7326><s%>, and suffer hunger <S%H7456><s%>: but they that seek <S%H1875><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall not want <S%H2637><s%> any good <S%H2896><s%> thing.
Come <S%H3212><s%>, ye children <S%H1121><s%>, hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto me: I will teach <S%H3925><s%> you the fear <S%H3374><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
What man <S%H376><s%> is he that desireth <S%H2655><s%> life <S%H2416><s%>, and loveth <S%H157><s%> many days <S%H3117><s%>, that he may see <S%H7200><s%> good <S%H2896><s%>?
Keep <S%H5341><s%> thy tongue <S%H3956><s%> from evil <S%H7451><s%>, and thy lips <S%H8193><s%> from speaking <S%H1696><s%> guile <S%H4820><s%>.
Depart <S%H5493><s%> from evil <S%H7451><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> good <S%H2896><s%>; seek <S%H1245><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%>, and pursue <S%H7291><s%> it.
The eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> are upon the righteous <S%H6662><s%>, and his ears <S%H241><s%> are open unto their cry <S%H7775><s%>.
The face <S%H6440><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is against them that do <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%>, to cut off <S%H3772><s%> the remembrance <S%H2143><s%> of them from the earth <S%H776><s%>.
The righteous cry <S%H6817><s%>, and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> heareth <S%H8085><s%>, and delivereth <S%H5337><s%> them out of all their troubles <S%H6869><s%>.
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is nigh <S%H7138><s%> unto them that are of a broken <S%H7665><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%>; and saveth <S%H3467><s%> such as be of a contrite <S%H1793><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%>.
Many <S%H7227><s%> are the afflictions <S%H7451><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%>: but the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delivereth <S%H5337><s%> him out of them all.
He keepeth <S%H8104><s%> all his bones <S%H6106><s%>: not one <S%H259><s%> of them <S%H2007><s%> is broken <S%H7665><s%>.
Evil <S%H7451><s%> shall slay <S%H4191><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%>: and they that hate <S%H8130><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be desolate <S%H816><s%>.
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> redeemeth <S%H6299><s%> the soul <S%H5315><s%> of his servants <S%H5650><s%>: and none of them that trust <S%H2620><s%> in him shall be desolate <S%H816><s%>.
